					<item>
		<title>PROJECT KILGORE BY ALTHEPROFESSOR</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/project-kilgore-by-altheprofessor/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 24 Nov 2017 13:57:30 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[joao]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3333</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[An Air Force Plant !?

Yes someone has just made an Air Force plant pot and it is very wavey.

The design is entirely hand stitched, made from premium tumbled leather and authentic Nike embroidery.

All made by <strong><em><a style="color: #000000;" href="https://www.instagram.com/altheprofessor/">Altheprofessor</a>, </em></strong>a genius idea, check it out below.

<em>"Created by designer Bruce Kilgore in 1982, the Air Force 1 remains one of Nike's most well celebrated silhouettes to date. Now 35 years after it inception, Project Kilgore reinvents the shoe as a decorative home for plants.</em>

<em>Premium tumbled leather</em>

<em>Entirely hand stitched</em>

<em>Authentic Nike embroidery</em>

<em>Features the original Deubre"</em>

<strong><a href="https://www.altheprofessor.com">https://www.altheprofessor.com</a></strong>

<img src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/FORCE.png" sizes="(max-width: 805px) 100vw, 805px" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/FORCE.png?w=805&amp;ssl=1 805w, https://i0.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/FORCE.png?resize=293%2C300&amp;ssl=1 293w, https://i0.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/FORCE.png?resize=768%2C785&amp;ssl=1 768w, https://i0.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/FORCE.png?resize=391%2C400&amp;ssl=1 391w, https://i0.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/FORCE.png?resize=45%2C45&amp;ssl=1 45w" alt="" width="805" height="823" />
<figure><img src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/2.png" alt="2" /></figure>
<figure><img src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/3.png" alt="3" /></figure>
Look forward to what more he has up his sleeve.

Make sure you check him out !

<a style="color: #000000;" href="https://www.altheprofessor.com/"><strong>https://www.altheprofessor.com/</strong></a>

<strong>Twitter</strong> - <a style="color: #000000;" href="https://twitter.com/altheprofessor" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Altheprofessor</a>
<strong>Instagram</strong> - <a style="color: #000000;" href="https://www.instagram.com/altheprofessor/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Altheprofessor</a>

<a href="https://www.altheprofessor.com/" data-elementor-open-lightbox="default">
<img src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/sas-300x300.png" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" srcset="https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/sas.png?resize=300%2C300&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/sas.png?resize=150%2C150&amp;ssl=1 150w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/sas.png?resize=180%2C180&amp;ssl=1 180w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/sas.png?resize=600%2C600&amp;ssl=1 600w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/sas.png?resize=350%2C350&amp;ssl=1 350w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/sas.png?resize=45%2C45&amp;ssl=1 45w" alt="" width="300" height="300" /> </a>]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_elementor_data]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[{"id":"1d77e957","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"id":"7cc35c7e","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"id":"4a63ce74","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<p><span style=\"font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #000000;\">An Air Force Plant !?<\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #000000;\">Yes someone has just made an Air Force plant pot and it is very wavey.<\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #000000;\">The design is entirely hand stitched, made from premium tumbled leather and authentic Nike embroidery.<\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #000000;\">All made by <strong><em><a style=\"color: #000000;\" href=\"https:\/\/www.instagram.com\/altheprofessor\/\">Altheprofessor<\/a>, <\/em><\/strong>a genius idea, check it out below.<\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"color: #000000;\"><em><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\"Created by designer Bruce Kilgore in 1982, the Air Force 1 remains one of Nike's most well celebrated silhouettes to date. Now 35 years after it inception, Project Kilgore reinvents the shoe as a decorative home for plants.<\/span><\/em><\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"color: #000000;\"><em><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">Premium tumbled leather<\/span><\/em><\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"color: #000000;\"><em><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">Entirely hand stitched<\/span><\/em><\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"color: #000000;\"><em><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">Authentic Nike embroidery<\/span><\/em><\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"color: #000000;\"><em><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">Features the original Deubre<span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"outline: 0px; 							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Another Style of Air Max 97&#039;s Is Coming Out</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/another-style-air-max-97s-coming/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 05 Dec 2017 05:48:11 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[joao]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3368</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong>Replacing the silhouette's signature upper pattern.</strong>

To celebrate the 20th anniversary of the original release of the <a style="color: #000000;" href="https://solecollector.com/tag/nike-air-max-97" target="_self">Air Max 97</a> Nike have released a variety of different versions this year. They brought back OG colourways, introducing <a style="color: #000000;" href="http://solecollector.com/news/2017/07/nike-air-max-97-fall-2017-releases" target="_self">more </a><a style="color: #000000;" href="https://solecollector.com/news/2017/07/nike-air-max-97-fall-2017-releases" target="_self">modern iterations</a> of the shoe, and even collaborated with artists like Skepta, brands like Off-White and Undefeated. Despite 2017 coming to a close, Nike are not done with Air Max 97's

<img src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/nike-air-max-97-ultra-black-new-design.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 940px) 100vw, 940px" srcset="https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/nike-air-max-97-ultra-black-new-design.jpg?w=940&amp;ssl=1 940w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/nike-air-max-97-ultra-black-new-design.jpg?resize=300%2C211&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/nike-air-max-97-ultra-black-new-design.jpg?resize=768%2C539&amp;ssl=1 768w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/nike-air-max-97-ultra-black-new-design.jpg?resize=570%2C400&amp;ssl=1 570w" alt="" width="940" height="660" />
<img src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo-1024x1024.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" srcset="https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo.jpg?resize=1024%2C1024&amp;ssl=1 1024w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo.jpg?resize=150%2C150&amp;ssl=1 150w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo.jpg?resize=300%2C300&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo.jpg?resize=768%2C768&amp;ssl=1 768w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo.jpg?resize=180%2C180&amp;ssl=1 180w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo.jpg?resize=600%2C600&amp;ssl=1 600w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo.jpg?resize=400%2C400&amp;ssl=1 400w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo.jpg?resize=350%2C350&amp;ssl=1 350w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo.jpg?resize=45%2C45&amp;ssl=1 45w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo.jpg?w=2000&amp;ssl=1 2000w" alt="" width="1024" height="1024" />
<img src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ebee1qmvxcbnpeyvrzrt-1024x565.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" srcset="https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ebee1qmvxcbnpeyvrzrt.jpg?resize=1024%2C565&amp;ssl=1 1024w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ebee1qmvxcbnpeyvrzrt.jpg?resize=300%2C165&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ebee1qmvxcbnpeyvrzrt.jpg?resize=768%2C423&amp;ssl=1 768w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ebee1qmvxcbnpeyvrzrt.jpg?resize=629%2C347&amp;ssl=1 629w, https://i1.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ebee1qmvxcbnpeyvrzrt.jpg?resize=453%2C250&amp;ssl=1 453w" alt="" width="1024" height="565" />

A brand new version has surfaced with a new take on the silhouette's signature upper pattern.

This new variation of the Air Max 97 Ultra replaces the standard look with a similar wavy pattern, but with more lines, more definition, and wrapping around the entirety of the upper—including even the mudguard. This particular pair takes on a triple black colorway, but more variations wouldn't be surprising to see in the future.

Are you ready for Air Max 98's in 2018?

An official release date and retail pricing have yet to be announced.

Source : <a style="color: #000000;" href="https://solecollector.com/news/2017/11/nike-air-max-97-ultra-triple-black-new-pattern">Sole Collector</a>

<img src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/pqwargklywqnsslqzlya-1024x627.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" srcset="https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/pqwargklywqnsslqzlya.jpg?resize=1024%2C627&amp;ssl=1 1024w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/pqwargklywqnsslqzlya.jpg?resize=300%2C184&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/pqwargklywqnsslqzlya.jpg?resize=768%2C470&amp;ssl=1 768w, https://i2.wp.com/crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/pqwargklywqnsslqzlya.jpg?resize=629%2C385&amp;ssl=1 629w" alt="" width="1024" height="627" />]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[{"id":"6ec29eff","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"id":"38b0b491","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"id":"6306893b","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<p class=\"article-header__description\"><strong><span style=\"color: #000000;\">Replacing the silhouette's signature upper pattern.<\/span><\/strong><\/p><p><span style=\"color: #000000;\">To celebrate the 20th anniversary of the original release of the\u00a0<a style=\"color: #000000;\" href=\"https:\/\/solecollector.com\/tag\/nike-air-max-97\" target=\"_self\">Air Max 97<\/a>\u00a0Nike have released a variety of different versions this year. They brought back\u00a0OG colourways, introducing\u00a0<a style=\"color: #000000;\" href=\"http:\/\/solecollector.com\/news\/2017\/07\/nike-air-max-97-fall-2017-releases\" target=\"_self\">more\u00a0<\/a><a style=\"color: #000000;\" href=\"https:\/\/solecollector.com\/news\/2017\/07\/nike-air-max-97-fall-2017-releases\" target=\"_self\">modern iterations<\/a>\u00a0of the shoe, and even collaborated with artists like\u00a0Skepta, brands like Off-White and Undefeated. Despite 2017 coming to a close, Nike are not done with Air Max 97's<\/span><\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"1e22d2f","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"id":"5d13fde","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"id":"09ca1a4","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"https:\/\/crepplug.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/12\/nike-air-max-97-ultra-black-new-design.jpg","id":3372}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"f46b89a","elType":"section","settings":{"structure":"21"},"elements":[{"id":"dd90560","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":33,"_inline_size":39.13},"elements":[{"id":"9814041","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"https:\/\/crepplug.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/12\/ltx8rexbm6y5qexqgbvo.jpg","id":3370}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":false},{"id":"377e921","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":66,"_inline_size":60.802},"elements":[{"id":"15ae090","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"https:\/\/crepplug.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/12\/ebee1qmvxcbnpeyvrzrt.jpg","id":3369}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"5edb3c7","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"id":"3dc9910","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"id":"6df2426","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<p><span style=\"color: #000000;\">A brand new version has surfaced with a new take on the silhouette's signature upper pattern.<\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"color: #000000;\">This new variation of the Air Max 97 Ultra replaces the standard look with a similar wavy pattern, but with more lines, more definition, and wrapping around the entirety of the upper\u2014including even the mudguard. This particular pair takes on a triple black colorway, but more variations wouldn't be surprising to see in the future.<\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"color: #000000;\">Are you ready for Air Max 98's in 2018?<\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"color: #000000;\">An official release date and retail pricing have yet to be announced.<\/span><\/p><p><span style=\"color: #000000;\">Source :\u00a0<a style=\"color: #000000;\" href=\"https:\/\/solecollector.com\/news\/2017\/11\/nike-air-max-97-ultra-triple-black-new-pattern\">Sole Collector<\/a><\/span><\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"f542155","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"id":"bc582f7","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"id":"0658be5","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"https:\/\/crepplug.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2017\/12\/pqwargklywqnsslqzlya.jpg","id":3371}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title>NBA Star LeBron James wears Black and White ‘Equality’ shoes in protest against Donald Trump</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/nba-star-lebron-james-wears-black-white-equality-shoes-protest-donald-trump/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 26 Dec 2017 11:25:16 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[joao]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3439</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[NBA star LeBron James made a powerful statement both on and off the court as he stepped on the court in Washington DC earlier this month

Not because of his third straight triple-double  but rather his decision to wear one black and one white Nike trainer, both with the word equality stitched at the back

Cleveland Cavaliers forward James has been among the most politically vocal players in basketball over recent years, labelling Donald Trump a “bum” on Twitter after the President withdrew the customary invitation to the White House that would have been handed to last season’s NBA champions, the Golden State Warriors.

“We all know where we are right now, and we know who is at the helm here,” James said after the Cavaliers’ 106-99 win over the Washington Wizards.

<img class="alignnone  wp-image-3441" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/lebron-james-networth-300x169.jpg" alt="" width="936" height="527" />

“Us as Americans, no matter the skin colour, no matter the race, no matter who you are, I think we all have to understand that having equal rights and being able to stand for something and speak for something and keeping the conversation going [is important]."

“Equality is all about understanding our rights, understanding what we stand for and how powerful we are as men and women, black or white or Hispanic.

“It doesn't matter your race, whatever the case may be, this is a beautiful country, and we're never going to let one person dictate how beautiful and how powerful we are.

<img class="alignnone  wp-image-3440" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/lebrontrainers-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="971" height="647" />

James wore a similar pair of the shoes – the LeBron 15 Equality PE – in the season’s opening game against the Boston Celtics, though both of those were black as a response to the pre-game protests of NFL players against Trump.

Despite the powerful message, James opted to change out of the shoes at half-time after making only four of his first 12 shots. He would go on to score 20 points, adding 12 rebounds and 15 assists for his sixth triple-double of the year.

Source :<a href="https://www.standard.co.uk/sport/nba-star-lebron-james-wears-black-and-white-equality-shoes-in-protest-against-donald-trump-a3722256.html"> Evening Standard</a>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title>Nike Air Max 98 “Gundam” for The 20th Anniversary</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/nike-air-max-98-gundam-20th-anniversary/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 02 Jan 2018 18:00:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[joao]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3501</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Nike rarely use their Air Max 98 silhouette however it has been a part of some notable releases, like its collaboration with Supreme from back in 2016. 2018 marks the 20th anniversary of the model, and if last years Air Max 97 releases are any indication, it should be a much bigger year for the 98. To start off the Air Max 98’s celebrations they will return with its original “Gundam” colorway that utilizes white, blue, and red across the upper with some hits of black.  If you are a fan of the Air Max 98, then 2018 should be the year for you, but you may get annoyed if you start seeing everyone rock your favourite crep!

There has been rumours that they will drop this January and outlets such as <strong>Urban Industry</strong> have confirmed this with the<strong> <a href="https://www.urbanindustry.co.uk/blogs/upcoming-releases/nike-air-max-98-qs-thunder-blue">countdown</a></strong> of their drop for the Nike Air Max 98's <a href="https://www.urbanindustry.co.uk/blogs/upcoming-releases/nike-air-max-98-qs-thunder-blue"><strong>26.01.18 8AM GMT </strong></a>

<img class="alignnone wp-image-3502" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/nike-air-max-98-gundam-january-2018-1-300x210.jpg" alt="" width="731" height="513" /><img class="alignnone wp-image-3503" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/nike-air-max-98-gundam-january-2018-3-300x300.jpg" alt="" width="503" height="503" />

Stay tuned to CrepPlug for updates regarding this release and other upcoming Air Max 98 drops.

Source : <a href="https://sneakernews.com/2017/12/04/nike-air-max-98-gundam-2018-release-info/">SneakerNews</a>

Let us know your thoughts !]]></content:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>Another Nike Hybrid : NIKE VAPORMAX PLUS TRIPLE BLACK</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/another-nike-hybrid-nike-vapormax-plus-triple-black/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 07 Jan 2018 14:17:29 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[joao]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3518</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class="alignnone wp-image-3524" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/nike-vapormax-plus-triple-black-5-300x210.jpg" alt="" width="974" height="682" />

Nike continues to fuse together new and old. Marking the 20th anniversary year of Tuned Air, this upcoming hybrid combines the upper from the classic 1998 Air Max Plus with today’s Vapormax sole. Having been revealed in three colourways, the Triple Black Vapormax Plus is arguably the cleanest and the most anticipated colourway.

The NIKE VAPORMAX PLUS TRIPLE BLACK even tweaks the trademark yellow hexagon “Tn Air” emblem to the back heel to read “Vm Air.” Which obviously stands for Vapormax Air.

2018 is gearing up to be a big year for the Plus, so notable releases like this should become a trend over the next 12 months.

The NIKE VAPORMAX PLUS TRIPLE BLACK is set to release on THURSDAY 25 JANUARY with a general release yet to be announced. Until that time, stock up on some nike gems by checking out our <a href="https://crepplug.com/shop/">Store</a>.

List of where to cop them from is <a href="https://www.thedropdate.com/releases/nike-air-vapormax-plus-triple-black-924453-004">HERE</a>

What do you think of this release, let us know !

<img class="alignnone wp-image-3519" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/nike-vapormax-plus-triple-black-1-300x300.jpg" alt="" width="993" height="993" />

<img class="alignnone wp-image-3523" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/nike-vapormax-plus-triple-black-4-300x210.jpg" alt="" width="987" height="691" /> <img class="alignnone wp-image-3522" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/nike-vapormax-plus-triple-black-3-300x210.jpg" alt="" width="986" height="690" /> <img class="alignnone wp-image-3521" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/nike-vapormax-plus-triple-black-2-300x211.jpg" alt="" width="987" height="694" />

Sources : <a href="https://www.thedropdate.com/rumoured/nike-vapormax-plus-triple-black">The Drop Date</a>, <a href="https://sneakernews.com/2017/12/31/nike-vapormax-plus-triple-black-detailed-look/">Sneaker News</a>]]></content:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>What&#039;s So Good About The Nike Air Max 98&#039;s?</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/whats-good-nike-air-max-98s/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 04 Feb 2018 15:54:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[joao]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3587</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Just like the Air Max 97's last year the Nike <a href="http://sneakernews.com/tag/nike-air-max-98/">Air Max 98</a> is in full effect for 2018, and we can tell that the Nike are really building a hype around this trainer which is increasing as each new colourway is revealed. While the 98 model is not as recognized as the Air Max 97 models, Air Max fans remember the shoe well but it's only now that the mainstream are hoping onto the bandwagon. So here’s a list of ten things you should know about the Air Max 98's shoe of 2018, so whilst everyone wears them throughout the year you'll know the back story of what is on their feet.

<img class=" wp-image-3591 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/nike-air-max-98-gundam-640744-100-mood-2-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="654" height="437" />

&nbsp;
<p style="text-align: center;">The Nike Air Max 98 was designed by Sergio Lozano, who also designed the Air Max 95.</p>
<img class=" wp-image-3588 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/nike-air-max-98-navy-yellow-2018-release-date-3-300x211.jpg" alt="" width="646" height="454" />
<p style="text-align: center;">When the Air Max 98 first released, it was basically a flop for a few reasons one being them due to the price, $150 which was a bit of a stretch back then and most pairs ended up on sale</p>
<img class=" wp-image-3597 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/nike-air-max-98-history-8-300x211.jpg" alt="" width="659" height="463" />
<p style="text-align: center;">Most of the hype around new Air Max models was the redesigned Air bubbles. The 98, however, recycled the full-length Air unit from the 97, which took away from allure.</p>
<img class=" wp-image-3601 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/nike-air-max-98-history-1-300x210.jpg" alt="" width="663" height="464" />
<p style="text-align: center;">The Youth sizes of the Air Max 98 used the sole for the Air Max 95</p>
<img class=" wp-image-3596 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/nike-air-max-98-history-5-300x210.jpg" alt="" width="676" height="473" />
<p style="text-align: center;">This OG colorway is called “Gundam” because of its resemblance to its mecha-based anime of the same name. But, there was never any collaboration between Nike and the anime.</p>
<img class=" wp-image-3598 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/nike-air-max-98-history-9-300x210.jpg" alt="" width="657" height="460" />
<p style="text-align: center;">Nike then released several new Air Max models in 1998 that were way more popular; the Air Max 98 TL, Air Max Tailwind III, Air Max Plus, and retro of the Air Max 95 overshadowed the Air Max 98.</p>
<img class=" wp-image-3592 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/nike-air-max-98-history-2-300x210.jpg" alt="" width="650" height="455" />
<p style="text-align: center;">The Air Max 98 first retroed in 2000 with colorways inspired by the Air Max 95</p>
<img class=" wp-image-3599 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/nike-air-max-98-history-10-300x210.jpg" alt="" width="645" height="451" />
<p style="text-align: center;">The Air Max 98 retroed again in 2014 in original colorways as well as new ones. Again, most of them just ended up on sale racks for under $100, so if you could see in the future back then and bought a few pairs you'd be chilling right now.</p>
<img class=" wp-image-3594 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/nike-air-max-98-history-4-300x211.jpg" alt="" width="660" height="464" />
<p style="text-align: center;">Supreme’s Air Max 98 collaboration in 2016, which featured four colorways, were inspired by Prada’s America Cup sneakers, bringing the spotlight back onto the Nike Air Max 98's a giving them a bit of a revelation.</p>
<img class=" wp-image-3593 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/nike-air-max-98-history-3-300x168.jpg" alt="" width="716" height="401" />
<p style="text-align: center;">The 98 was simply hated on by Nike. In 2005’s “History of Air”, the model wasn’t even mentioned. In 2015’s Air Max Day tribute to the history of Air Max, and again it wasn't there.</p>
Source : <a href="https://sneakernews.com/2018/02/01/nike-air-max-98-history-info/">SneakerNews</a>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title>Kanye West x Adidas - &quot;Another One&quot;</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/kanye-west-x-adidas-another-one/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 05 Feb 2018 19:56:13 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[joao]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3605</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Kanye West has been credited, for turning around Adidas' popularity, and his Yeezy Boost trainers played a big part in changing the perception of the brand. Now he's on to a new pair of crep, the Desert Rat 500, which is moves away from the, overdone sock sho<a href="http://www.complex.com/sneakers/2018/01/sneaker-brands-stop-making-sock-shoes" target="_self">es</a> that are flooding the market.

The first version of this shoe is an off-white pair, which is being called "Blush," , Hypebeast teamed up with<a href="http://flightclub.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> Flight Club </a>to get a look at them.

The shoes are expected to release soon, and you can view the rest of the photos <a href="https://hypebeast.com/2018/2/yeezy-desert-rat-500-blush-closer-look" target="_blank" rel="noopener">here</a>.

<img class="alignnone  wp-image-3607" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/yeezy-desert-rat-500-on-foot-look-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="959" height="639" />

Source : <a href="http://www.complex.com/sneakers/2018/02/kanye-west-adidas-yeezy-desert-rat-500-blush-on-foot-photos">Complex</a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Kanye West has been credited, for turning around Adidas' popularity, and his Yeezy Boost trainers played a big part in changing the perception of the brand. Now he's on to a new pair of crep, the Desert Rat 500]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_linkdex]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[45]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title>#SKAir 2? 👀</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/sk-air-2/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 07 Feb 2018 23:01:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[joao]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3619</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Looks like we have another Skepta x Nike Collaboration !

https://www.instagram.com/p/Be5K_wvBOVj/?taken-by=nikelondon
<div class="article__copy">

Nike just teased their forthcoming SkAir 2 launch, with a preview showing the man himself Skepta, walking into a corner shop on his phone. Skepta has definitely been up to something after the success #Skair had last year.

It would be the third time Skepta has collaborated with Nike, with the first being Skepta x Air Max BW “Blacklisted”, and more recently as we all know the SK Air Max 97.

Click this link <a href="http://www.nike.com/london">www.nike.com/london</a>, and it will take you to an event page with the date 09.02.18.

If you scroll down a map will be revealed with a number of locations the capital city London, but they're all locked, on a incognito vibe.

However on Friday, if you click the "Notify Me" button you’ll be able to show the world that "Nothing Beats a LDNR".

Stay tuned for more information

Let us know what you think, what crep would you like Skepta to put a spin on?

Source : <a href="https://thesolesupplier.co.uk/news/nike-just-reveal-sk-air-2/">The Sole Supplier</a>

</div>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>OFF WHITE x Nike Air Force 1 “Virgil x MOMA”</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/off-white-x-nike-air-force-1-virgil-x-moma/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Feb 2018 20:28:06 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[joao]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3630</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Released on January 27th, at the Museum of Modern Art on 53rd Street in New York City., Virgil Abloh followed up on his illustrious OFF WHITE “The Ten” collection, with his first US drop since November when he held the entire Sneaker World on ropes.

These released exclusively in New York City at the Metropolitan Museum of Art (MoMA), blacked out OFF WHITE x Air Force 1 Low that featured the same deconstructed aesthetic as the rest of “The Ten” collection. It is not expected that this particular pair will ever hit retail shelves again, so you are just going to have to try your luck on the resale markets on the internet if you're looking to cop these such as Stadium Goods, where they are selling for crazy prices (basically a myth). However, there will still be plenty of Virgil’s OFF WHITE sneakers to go around in 2018, like new models of the Air Jordan 1 and the Nike Vapormax.

<img class="alignnone  wp-image-3634" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/virgil-abloh-nike-air-force-1-moma-black-1-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="978" height="653" /><img class="alignnone  wp-image-3633" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/virgil-moma-nike-air-force-1-low-detailed-look-5-300x211.jpg" alt="" width="979" height="688" />

Stay tuned for more info about Off-White x Nike releases, maybe Virgil Abloh will be kind and drop these again

Let us know what you think below !

Source : <a href="https://sneakernews.com/2018/01/30/virgil-moma-nike-air-force-1-low-detailed-look/">SneakerNews</a>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title>We&#039;re Hiring</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/were-hiring/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Feb 2018 21:19:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[joao]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3631</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="text-align: center;">https://www.instagram.com/p/BfB7drXhZHz/?taken-by=creppluguk</p>
It’s almost been a year since our official launch and day by day we grow bigger and better. We have been blessed with the great following which we have, all the support and all the love shown by you guys for the past year has allowed us to provide you with the freshest content, news, music and creps in the game.

Due to our growth and our plans for the future we have decided to expand and strive in every field possible so that we can become the UK’s leading sneaker marketplace and community.

We are going to be hiring numerous individuals to work with us to help provide the freshest and coldest content. We want positively driven people who can take responsibility for their own work and provide Crepplug with new creative ideas to help us all strive for growth and success.

We're looking for:
<ul>
 	<li>Bloggers</li>
 	<li>Videographers</li>
 	<li>Photographers</li>
 	<li>Social Media Directors</li>
 	<li>Youtubers</li>
 	<li>Resellers</li>
 	<li>Suppliers</li>
 	<li>Creatives</li>
 	<li>Content Creators</li>
 	<li>Video Editors</li>
 	<li>Creative Directors</li>
 	<li>Web/App Developers</li>
 	<li>Graphic Designers</li>
 	<li>Authenticators</li>
</ul>
Interested in Footwear, clothing, culture?

Are you a content creator, a creative or have ideas and want to work with us?

No mad experience is needed we’re looking to grow together with like-minded people.

Make sure to contact us via email <a href="mailto:contact@crepplug.com">contact@crepplug.com</a> or direct message us via our social media outlets in regards to ideas or if you’re looking to work with us, we’re open to anything.

Let’s work

Enjoy the video !]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title>Black Panther Trainers ?</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/black-panther-trainers/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 15 Feb 2018 18:18:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[joao]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3666</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class=" wp-image-3670 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/bait-puma-tsugi-black-panther-1-300x211.jpg" alt="" width="925" height="650" />

Black Panther, the film everyone is talking about has it's own pair of trainers.The hype has even caught the attention of major sneaker brands such Puma. Puma and BAIT teamed up for a "Black Panther" pack, which includes all-black versions of the Mostro Mid and Tsugi BOG.

<img class=" wp-image-3667 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/bait-puma-black-panther-2-300x211.jpg" alt="" width="776" height="546" />
<div class="m-detail--body-item">
<figure class="l-inline tml-image m-detail--tml-image--inline"><a><picture class="is-loaded"><source srcset="https://www.maxim.com/.image/c_limit%2Ccs_srgb%2Cq_80%2Cw_320/MTUzMzkzMjY3OTY1MTc1MTA0/bait-puma-black-panther-tsugi-bog-mostro-mi-2.webp 320w, https://www.maxim.com/.image/c_limit%2Ccs_srgb%2Cq_80%2Cw_640/MTUzMzkzMjY3OTY1MTc1MTA0/bait-puma-black-panther-tsugi-bog-mostro-mi-2.webp 640w, https://www.maxim.com/.image/c_limit%2Ccs_srgb%2Cq_80%2Cw_960/MTUzMzkzMjY3OTY1MTc1MTA0/bait-puma-black-panther-tsugi-bog-mostro-mi-2.webp 960w, https://www.maxim.com/.image/c_limit%2Ccs_srgb%2Cq_80%2Cw_1000/MTUzMzkzMjY3OTY1MTc1MTA0/bait-puma-black-panther-tsugi-bog-mostro-mi-2.webp 1000w" type="image/webp" sizes="(min-width: 1023px) 780px, (min-width: 675px) 620px, 100vw" /><source srcset="https://www.maxim.com/.image/c_limit%2Ccs_srgb%2Cq_80%2Cw_320/MTUzMzkzMjY3OTY1MTc1MTA0/bait-puma-black-panther-tsugi-bog-mostro-mi-2.jpg 320w, https://www.maxim.com/.image/c_limit%2Ccs_srgb%2Cq_80%2Cw_640/MTUzMzkzMjY3OTY1MTc1MTA0/bait-puma-black-panther-tsugi-bog-mostro-mi-2.jpg 640w, https://www.maxim.com/.image/c_limit%2Ccs_srgb%2Cq_80%2Cw_960/MTUzMzkzMjY3OTY1MTc1MTA0/bait-puma-black-panther-tsugi-bog-mostro-mi-2.jpg 960w, https://www.maxim.com/.image/c_limit%2Ccs_srgb%2Cq_80%2Cw_1000/MTUzMzkzMjY3OTY1MTc1MTA0/bait-puma-black-panther-tsugi-bog-mostro-mi-2.jpg 1000w" sizes="(min-width: 1023px) 780px, (min-width: 675px) 620px, 100vw" /></picture></a></figure>
BAIT and Puma have only produced a limited number of each, 300 pairs of the Tsugi BOG and 100 pairs of the Mostro Mid, which were won via an online raffle.The BAIT x Black Panther x Puma Tsugi BOG sneakers went for $150 and the Mostro Mid for $160.

<img class=" wp-image-3668 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/bait-puma-black-panther-1-300x211.jpg" alt="" width="928" height="653" />

Have you watched the film ? Let us know what you thought of it !

Source : <a href="https://www.maxim.com/style/puma-bait-black-panther-sneaker-pack-2018-2">Maxim</a>

					<item>
		<title>Crepplug Styles</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/crepplug-styles/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 01 Mar 2018 16:03:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[estaaxo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3722</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong>Welcome Crep Plug Family,</strong>

We will be starting a new series which will be all about the latest shoes available and ways that they can be easily styled to your own satisfaction.

&nbsp;

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3746" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/Untitled-210x300.png" alt="" width="210" height="300" /> <img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3747" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/Untitled-2-300x243.png" alt="" width="300" height="243" />

&nbsp;

[caption id="attachment_3748" align="alignnone" width="300"]<img class="wp-image-3748 size-medium" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_0588-300x225.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="225" /> Air Vapormax Plus - Cool Grey Dark Grey[/caption]

Here is the newly released Air <a href="https://www.offspring.co.uk/view/product/offspring_catalog/5,22/2884323657">VAPORMAX PLUS - COOL GREY</a> which became available from the 25th of February, following the release of the first three Colours the VAPORMAX PLUS TRIPLE BLACK, DARK GREEN AND PLATINUM WHITE in January. This Edition of the VAPORMAX can be easily paired with bright and neutral colours to compliment the BEAUTY of the ice like appearance of the shoes.

&nbsp;

[caption id="attachment_3751" align="alignnone" width="225"]<img class="wp-image-3751 size-medium" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_0615-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" /> <a href="https://www.footlocker.co.uk/en/p/nike-sf-air-force-1-mid-men-shoes-48382?v=314107451404#!searchCategory=all">Nike SF Air Force 1 Mid</a>[/caption]

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3749" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_0607-187x300.jpg" alt="" width="187" height="300" /> <img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3750" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_0611-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" />

<span style="text-indent: 0em"> </span>Nike Air force 1 have released a new collection different from the other, this navy hightop airforces has gold accents embedded in the shoes to compliment the suede material and the writing included. They are easily paired with dark jeans and neutral coloured tops &amp; jumpers (as seen above).

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

[caption id="attachment_3752" align="alignnone" width="297"]<img class="wp-image-3752 size-medium" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_0623-297x300.jpg" alt="" width="297" height="300" /> <a href="https://www.footlocker.co.uk/en/p/nike-air-max-97-ultra-17-men-shoes-46994?v=314211706404#!searchCategory=all">Nike Air Max 97 Ultra '17</a>[/caption]

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3753" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_0626-300x282.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="282" />

<span style="text-indent: 0em"> </span>

The nike air max 97 collection has become a force to be reckoned, following the many colours and styles which have been released as of recent in celebration of the 20th anniversary of the original release. The 97 model's which have created quite a hype, are a favourable pair to have in your wardrobe, as they are comfortable and stylish with the range of designs that is offered. They can be styled and dressed up in anyways you choose, the images above shows one way to pair it.

There are many outlets where you can find many you can grab yourself a pair of the <a href="https://www.footlocker.co.uk/en/all/nike_air-max-97">nike Air Max 97's.</a>

&nbsp;

[caption id="attachment_3755" align="alignnone" width="225"]<img class="wp-image-3755 size-medium" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_0556-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" /> Vans Old Skool In Pink Suede[/caption]

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3754" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_0553-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" />

Lastly this <a href="http://www.asos.com/vans/vans-old-skool-unisex-trainers-in-pink-suede/prd/8711458?affid=14173&amp;channelref=product+search&amp;mk=abc&amp;currencyid=1&amp;ppcadref=761030383%7C39786846163%7Caud-108719242581%3Apla-394627845019&amp;_cclid=v3_5e9192dd-b89d-5d39-83c0-5fb654a57e22&amp;gclid=Cj0KCQiA5t7UBRDaARIsAOreQtj0_BtYr5uC2rwuWKp_1esMWxI3bZx8JXf-6ySzWAfBi-63blJ4fc8aAk9SEALw_wcB">Pink Suede Vans</a> released late last year, is a great addition to your wardrobe. Its suitable within any season and can be styled in many ways such as tracksuits, jeans, dresses, skirts etc. You can never go wrong with a pair a vans. The old skool edition has become highly favourable amongst men and female fashion following its long line of colours and designs. They are accessible in many shops.

&nbsp;

Tell us what you think about these releases &amp; let us know if you like this new series.

&nbsp;

Follow @estaaxo ✨

https://www.instagram.com/estaaxo/]]></content:encoded>

					</item>
					<item>
		<title>Welcome to the Wonderful World of Dear Annie.</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/welcome-wonderful-world-dear-annie/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 02 Mar 2018 19:27:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[senseimel]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3762</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-3763" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/dear-annie.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="300" />

A <span style="text-indent: 0em;">wonderful world it is indeed. Friday 16</span><sup style="text-indent: 0em;">th</sup><span style="text-indent: 0em;"> of February 2018 saw the release of Irish rapper, Rejjie Snow’s debut studio album: Dear Annie. Twenty tracks with a variety of feelings poured into each one, broken up by skits between a reminiscent Rejjie and a radio host.</span>

The album starts out with a church-like vibe on the song <em>Hello</em>, the words “black is beautiful” are repeated throughout. It’s known that Rejjie takes a lot of pride in his heritage, he is Nigerian, Jamaican and Irish; we see this in many of his other songs including <em>Blakkst Skn</em> (produced by the multi-faceted Kaytranada). From the claps and chords in the beat, to the choir-like vocals <em>Hello</em> sets the tone for an album which will be self-reflecting and mellow in tone. <em>Rainbows</em> is up next, the synthetic chords that have been subtly added are classic Snow behaviour as we’ve seen in several of his previous songs and projects. Snow dives into his feelings about religion and a little bit about his mental state saying, “I’ll be shaking hands with God, but they say he don’t exist”.

We are then introduced to the first of many skits of Rejjie on the radio show ‘Wonderful World of Dear Annie’ with a host whose name we never get to find out. Rejjie explains the meaning and reasoning for some of the songs in this part of the album. I liked these recurring parts in the album, it allowed fluid transition between the different moods throughout as they often came in when there was a tempo change between groups of songs (they were also funny). It also gave me time to digest what I had just heard or get ready for what I was about to hear.

The next doublet of songs is 23 and Pink Lemonade, I think these two are in the top 5 tracks of this album. 23 describes a brief relationship Rejjie had with a girl while he was out in L.A. and how in hindsight it could come across as toxic, but they loved each other. The song has a very reminiscent vibe, Rejjie and the female vocalist go back and forth throughout the song in what feels to the listener as a conversation in their relationship (at that time). I like how the beat is very minimalistic as it highlights the actual lyrics more and they become the focus of the song.

This leads perfectly into Pink Lemonade in which Rejjie is talking about a girl who he likes and it’s her birthday. A wide range of metaphors and descriptive lyrics, this song is an absolute vibe and you can tell Snow spent time constructing it in such a way that the listener would be able to picture the female he’s talking about. The beat has more of a part to play in Pink Lemonade compared to 23, there’s a lot of synthetic chords along with drums that create a mellow, airy track.

<img class="size-medium wp-image-3765 alignnone" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/Rejjie-242x300.jpg" alt="" width="242" height="300" />

The tempo then becomes more upbeat with the songs Spaceships and Egyptian Luvr. These two songs definitely stand out in the album as ‘radio-perfect’. Normally, when it comes to albums I don’t tend to like the ‘radio-perfect’ songs the most but in this case, I did. Spaceships features the talented Ebenezer. Snow and Ebenezer have often collaborated in the past so in the skit before when he mentions the feature I had no doubt in my mind that the song was going to be amazing. The song has a N.E.R.D. type feel with it being quite funky with more instruments and chords than heard in any of the previous songs.

Egyptian Luvr a single off the album features US-rapper Anime, his music aesthetic fits perfectly with Snows, so it was a collaboration made in heaven. The song was also produced by Canadian-producer Kaytranada who has worked with bot<span style="text-indent: 0em;">h rappers before, it was bound to a standout, if not the standout.</span>

The whole album has a mellow vibe to it and definitely showcases Rejjie Snow’s potential as a new age hip-hop artist. It’s evident that artists like N.E.R.D. and Tyler, the Creator have influenced the album with the prevalence of several synthesised chords and futuristic jazz funk vibe. Snow keeps consistent with the story about love and his relationship with a female he tells throughout. There’s no doubt that this is the beginning of the greatness we can expect to come from Rejjie Snow.

Listen here: <a href="https://open.spotify.com/album/4cZXuI6i7lHkWrAnHRr1Hk">https://open.spotify.com/album/4cZXuI6i7lHkWrAnHRr1Hk</a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

					<item>
		<title>Off-White Hype &#038; AJ1 2018</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/off-white-hype/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 04 Mar 2018 13:17:56 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[ilaydamc]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3775</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Virgil Abloh’s highly acclaimed <b><i>OFF-WHITE</i></b> was launched in 2013 and has since become a pinnacle in the luxury-streetwear industry. The brand is a full cut and </span>sew<span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> line produced in Italy, blending the fine line between streetwear and high-end fashion. Virgil Abloh built his empire from young. At the age of 22, he was appointed a </span>creative<span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;"> consultant for Kanye West. The two interned at <img class="wp-image-3776 alignright" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/KANYE-AB-300x169.jpg" alt="" width="409" height="230" /></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b><i>FENDI’s</i></b> Rome headquarters in 2009; the same year he founded RSVP Gallery boutique with Don C. Abloh then became the art director for Kanye West &amp; Jay-Z’s notorious <b><i>Watch the Throne</i></b>, through which he picked up a Grammy nomination for Best Recording Package.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Virgil Abloh<span style="text-indent: 0em;">’s first venture into independent fashion was in 2012, where he launched </span><b style="text-indent: 0em;"><i>Pyrex Vision</i></b><span style="text-indent: 0em;">. He created a small collection of Champion tees, hoodies, basketball shorts, plastered in bold lettering and Renaissance artwork. In an interview, Abloh said he considered </span><b style="text-indent: 0em;"><i>Pyrex </i></b><span style="text-indent: 0em;">an experim</span><span style="text-indent: 0em;">ental art project. In between this, and the launch of </span><b style="text-indent: 0em;"><i>OFF-WHITE</i></b><span style="text-indent: 0em;"> in 2013, he formed the </span><span style="text-indent: 0em;">collaborative group </span><b style="text-indent: 0em;"><i>‘BEEN TRILL’</i></b><span style="text-indent: 0em;">; self-described as an art collective/DJ crew. Abloh’s role with </span><b style="text-indent: 0em;"><i>BEEN TRILL</i></b><span style="text-indent: 0em;"> launched his DJ alias </span><b style="text-indent: 0em;"><i>‘Flat White’.</i></b></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;">In 2015, he was the only American to become a finalist for the prestigious <b><i>LVMH Prize</i></b>, an award for young fashion designers. The next year, Virgil Abloh’s collaborated with Moncler, Levis, and artist Brendan Fowler. 2017 however, was definitely OFF-WHITE’S most abundant year. He opened a number of perm<span style="text-indent: 0em;">anent stores, all around the world. As well as this, he collaborated with </span><b style="text-indent: 0em;"><i>Nike </i></b><span style="text-indent: 0em;">to release the infamous ‘The Ten’ collection. This was Abloh’s first major venture into the sneaker world.</span></span></p>
<span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><img class="aligncenter wp-image-3780" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/DH25cNsXcAEHoYN-300x169.jpg" alt="" width="444" height="250" /></span>

<span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><img class="wp-image-3778 alignleft" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/VAB-300x159.jpg" alt="" width="345" height="183" /></span>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><b><i>OFF-WHITE’s</i></b> presence at the Paris Fashion Week (FW18) Men’s show was a notable one. The show included a collection of new footwear items, included the globally renowned all-white Air Jordan 1. We first saw this silhouette in the traditional Chicago colorway, which was launched as part of <b><i>‘The Ten’</i></b>.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;">The new AJ1 features deconstructed Swooshes with hints of blue and orange threading, wings logo on the ankles, ‘AIR’ branding on the midsole and a baby blue hang tag (replacing the previous red one).</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;">The shoe released just yesterday, but is <!-- [if gte vml 1]&gt;-->already sold-out and estimated up to 2,000 USD on the resale market. This shoe has become the biggest sneaker launch of the year so far.</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif;"><img class="alignnone wp-image-3779" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_9831-300x297.jpg" alt="" width="350" height="346" /></span><!-- [if gte mso 9]&gt;--></span></p>
<span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><!-- [if !mso]&gt;--></span>

<span style="font-size: 10pt;"><!-- [if gte mso 9]&gt;--></span>

<span style="font-size: 10pt;"><!--StartFragment--> <!--EndFragment--></span>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino, serif; font-size: 10pt;">The soft tones are a perfect colorway for Spring/Summer, and it’s deconstructed, minimalist design is shaping a vision for the future of sneakers. The pair should be up for resale on CrepPlug very soon, so keep checking the site to get your hands on a pair!</span></p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title>THE 97 EDITION</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/the-97-edition/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 06 Mar 2018 07:21:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[urbanvstreet]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3789</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="text-align: left"><span style="font-size: 10pt;font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">Hello Crep Plugers! Urbanvstreet here bringing you information on the latest trainers; today's blog post will be looking at three different colour ways of the The Airmax 97 Collection which are still one of the most popular hyped shoes at the moment. The Airmax 97's have been ongoing for almost 20 years and are still game changers.</span></p>
<span style="font-size: 10pt;font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">The Airmax 97's are affordable and are extremely stylish and can go with almost everything. Below we have three different colours with purchase details linked below.</span>

<span style="font-size: 10pt;font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">Featuring your everyday go to trainer, to the not so everyday unique trainer to your must have! </span>

<span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size: 14pt"><span style="text-decoration: underline"><strong>THE EVERYDAY BLACKS</strong></span></span>

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3790" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_7542-290x300.jpg" alt="" width="290" height="300" />

<span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size: 10pt">Firstly we have the Nike Air Max 97 Ultra in the colour Black</span>

<span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size: 10pt">These can be seen as your go to trainers, giving you that fresh street style. With these you can wear them everyday with anything and everything allowing you to elevate a basic cool toned outfit.</span>

<span style="font-size: 10pt"><span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">These are available in Men, Women and Junior Sizes at: JD,</span><span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif"> Footlocker, </span><span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">FootAsylum</span></span>
<p style="text-align: left"><span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 18pt"><span style="font-size: 14pt"><strong><u>THE NOT SO EVERYDAY</u></strong></span>  </span></span></p>
<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3792" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_7752-300x149.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="149" />

<span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size: 10pt">Secondly we have the Nike Airmax 97 Ultra in the   colour Red</span>

<span style="font-size: 10pt;font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">These trainers can be seen as a statement piece and can't really be worn everyday. However not to worry if worn with the right outfits you'll have heads turning!</span>

<span style="font-size: 10pt;font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">This colour is very unique and not many have them as they went out of stock quite quick but these are very fashionable.</span>

<span style="font-size: 10pt"><span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">These are in available in Women's Sizes at: </span><span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">JD, </span><span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">ASOS</span></span>

<span style="font-size: 14pt;font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif"><strong><u>SILVER BULLET</u></strong></span>

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3791" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_7519-205x300.jpg" alt="" width="205" height="300" />

<span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size: 10pt"><span style="text-indent: 0em">Lastly we have the Nike Airmax 97 OG in Silver</span></span>
<p style="text-align: left"><span style="font-size: 10pt;font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">These were released on the 25th November to celebrate it's 20th anniversary. They feature a futuristic design featuring reflective fluid lines and a silvery tone inspired by Japan’s bullet trains set on top of full-length Max Air cushioning.</span></p>
<p style="text-align: left"><span style="font-size: 10pt;font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">Again these are your not so everyday trainers, but are definitely a must have unique pair! If worn correctly can also elevate a basic outfit</span></p>

<blockquote><span style="font-size: 10pt"><em><span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif">Comment down below to tell us about your thoughts of todays post, keep an eye out for our next post as more will be coming!</span></em></span></blockquote>
<em><span style="font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size: 12pt">Follow <a href="http://www.instagram.com/urbanvstreet">@urbanvstreet</a> on Instagram</span></em>

&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title>Battle Of The Sexes</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/battle-of-the-sexes/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 20 Mar 2018 15:45:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[urbanvstreet]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3867</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="text-align: center"><span style="font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif;font-size: 12pt">Todays blog post is a new series, which features a comparison of trainers looking at who wore them better?</span></p>
<p style="text-align: center"><span style="font-family: 'trebuchet ms', geneva, sans-serif;font-size: 12pt"><em><strong><u>Males or Females? Part 1!</u></strong></em></span></p>
<img class="size-medium wp-image-3870 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_8184-300x144.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="144" />
<p style="text-align: center"><span style="font-size: 12pt;font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif">On the left we have the Air Force 1 Low's in the colour brown which are a size 5.5 and are available to purchase in JD</span></p>
<p style="text-align: center"><span style="font-size: 12pt;font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif">On the right we have the Air Force 1 High's in the colour brown which are a size 8 and are also available to purchase in JD</span></p>
<p style="text-align: center"><span style="font-size: 12pt;font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif">The Air Force 1 Low and High trainers from Nike are a modern take on the '82 icon. They are built with a beige leather upper and showcase Nike's signature Swoosh to the sidewalls.</span></p>
&nbsp;
<p style="padding-left: 30px"><img class="size-medium wp-image-3876 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_8177-200x300.jpg" alt="" width="200" height="300" /></p>
<p style="text-align: center"><span style="font-size: 12pt;font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif">These brown Air Force 1's can elevate a basic all black outfit as demonstrated above and can still have all the heads turning because of their unique colour.</span></p>
<img class="size-medium wp-image-3874 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_8183-1-200x300.jpg" alt="" width="200" height="300" />
<p style="text-align: center"><strong><em><span style="font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif;font-size: 12pt">So who wore them better? Males or Females!</span></em></strong></p>

<blockquote>
<p style="text-align: center"><span style="font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif;font-size: 12pt">Comment down below to tell us about your thoughts of todays post, keep an eye out for part 2!</span></p>
</blockquote>
<p style="text-align: center"><span style="font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif;font-size: 12pt">Photos were taken by @kbo_photography</span></p>
<p style="text-align: center"><span style="font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif;font-size: 12pt">Follow @urbanvstreet on Instagram for more !</span></p>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title>Crepplug Styles: Nike Air Collection</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/crepplug-styles-nike-air-collection/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 26 Mar 2018 15:47:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[estaaxo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3890</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Hello Crep Plug Family,

I'm back with another post on how to style some of the available nike air trainers, so I hope this post is both enjoyable and helpful.

&nbsp;

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3906" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1009-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" /> <img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3908" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1016-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" /> <img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3910" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1029-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" />

Firstly we have the <em>Pink Nike Air Max 97</em> released in late August last year, following on from the comeback of the 97 collection that year. The nike air max has 3 tones of pink embedded in the design including the croc like texture which was added to the bottom lining of the shoe. This pair of trainers can be easily paired with bright, nude like colours as well as neutral colours. Here I paired it with a mauve oversized top following on from a dark blue pair of ripped jeans, which can be considerable great to wear this approaching spring.

This pair of shoe can be found in office: Click <a href="https://www.office.co.uk/view/product/office_catalog/2,20/2017662461"><em>Here </em></a>for the purchase link

&nbsp;

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-4073" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1050-2-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" /><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-4074" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1042-2-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" /><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3926" style="text-indent: 0em" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1071-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" />

Here we have the <em>Nike Air Force 1 '07 in Khaki Velvet</em> which was released late November last year. This is a beautiful pair of air forces to have because of its ice like look and comfortable feeling. This can be pared with many colours such as orange, tan, gold, grey and of course white and black. I paired this with a pair of grey jeans and White top which draws attention to the shoe than the attire. Others ways to also style this is to pair it with an oversized shirt or jumper, tracksuit, pant (cargo pants). This is a great pair of trainers as it is Unisex and can be complementing for both genders.

This pair of trainers can be found in the likes of Nike, Asos, Jd &amp; Footlocker: Click <a href="http://www.asos.com/nike/nike-air-force-1-07-trainers-in-khaki-velvet/prd/8750573?affid=14173&amp;channelref=product+search&amp;mk=abc&amp;currencyid=1&amp;ppcadref=761030383%7C39786851683%7Caud-108719242581%3Apla-388761680323&amp;_cclid=v3_8ea001b5-8a5f-5773-b6bf-8a0b02af532c&amp;gclid=Cj0KCQjwtOLVBRCZARIsADPLtJ22lw9hfUEDSTKsdz0qMJncVeA6700iskHK3gM7Zdh2aXXa6kWl5aoaArJhEALw_wcB"><em>Here </em></a>for the purchase link

<span style="text-indent: 0em"><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-4075" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1067-281x300.jpg" alt="" width="281" height="300" /> </span><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3917" style="text-indent: 0em" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1060-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" /> <span style="text-indent: 0em"> </span><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3922" style="text-indent: 0em" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1069-196x300.jpg" alt="" width="196" height="300" /> <span style="text-indent: 0em"> </span>

The <em>Nike Air Force 1 Upstep Premium Trainers In Blue Suede</em> was released las year spring along with a Pink version, which has now extended to many other colours available. It is fair to say that Nike Air force 1's have been a real hit this last few years with all the different designs and colour that have been released. This pair can be paired with pink, white, red, brown and many other neutral colours. I paired it with a white crop shirt and black ripped jeans which keeps the attention on the shoe. Again this is a pair that can be considered UNISEX as it can be worn by both genders.

Bought from ASOS, may be sold out: Click <a href="http://www.asos.com/nike/nike-air-force-1-upstep-premium-trainers-in-blue-suede/prd/7855248"><em>Here </em></a>for the purchase link

<img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3929" style="text-indent: 0em" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1075-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" /> <img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3930" style="text-indent: 0em" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1079-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" /> <span style="text-indent: 0em"> </span><span style="text-indent: 0em"> </span><img class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-3933" style="text-indent: 0em" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/IMG_1092-225x300.jpg" alt="" width="225" height="300" /><span style="text-indent: 0em">T</span>

Lastly the <em>Nike Air Huarache Run Ultra SE</em> here is a pair of trainers which defiantly lives up to its name as it feels like walking on air, the most comfortable pair of shoe from the Nike Air Collection in my opinion. I paired this with a oversized Tan shirt and black ripped jeans which I believe matches the trainers perfectly, This can also be paired with brown, white, burgundy, dark blue and grey clothing. I honestly advise investing in a pair of Nike Air huarache's, a great pair to have in your collection of trainers.

&nbsp;

(All trainers above are sized UK 5 &amp; 5.5, therefore it may be hard to find majority of the shoes.)
<blockquote><em><strong>Comment below which trainers you like best from the Nike Air Collection.</strong></em></blockquote>
Follow <a href="https://www.instagram.com/estaaxo/">@estaaxo</a> on Instagram for more outfit details ✨]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title>The Rise of The Air Max Plus</title>
		<link>https://shop.crepplug.com/the-rise-of-the-air-max-plus-crep-check-mondays/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 25 Mar 2018 13:27:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[crepcheckmondays]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://crepplug.com/?p=3900</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class=" wp-image-3937 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/March-2-2018-300x169.jpg" alt="Nike Air Max Plus" width="566" height="319" />
<div align="justify"></div>
<strong>UK Music:<a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v8ZZIA0DiPc"> <span style="text-decoration: underline;">Headie One - One Leanin'</span></a></strong>
<div align="justify">It's only right to start this off by saying; Happy Air Max Day! We hope you were able to cop all of the crep you wanted, or one at least.</div>
<div></div>
<div align="justify">Also, shoutout to Crep Plug for making this possible, if you're coming from Crep Check Mondays make sure to check out their socials and have a look around their website. You won't be disappointed.</div>
<div></div>
<div>As always, grab a snack and let's begin!</div>
<div></div>
<div>~</div>
<div align="justify">The Nike Air Max Plus, once an underdog is now a must-have for any sneaker collection. It first appeared in 1998, making 2018 it's twentieth birthday. Over the years it's popularity has fluctuated, declined and then been reborn, especially within the online sneaker community in the past two to three years. The AM Plus is one of the most sought after sneakers, the one that grabs all of the attention whenever you see it on your socials, especially Instagram. The one everyone always seems to ask about or comment on when you wear it, the one on the tip of everyone's tongue. Why, you ask? Well we're gonna break it down for you.</div>
<div></div>
<div><img class=" wp-image-3907 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/McDowell-original-sketch-nike.com_-300x214.jpg" alt="Sean McDowell Original Sketch of Nike Air Max Plus" width="355" height="253" /></div>
<div style="text-align: center;">

&nbsp;

<strong>Photo credit: news.nike.com</strong>

</div>
<div></div>
<div align="justify">Back in 1997 Sean McDowell was tasked with creating a design for the Air Max Plus which was originally created to be a running shoe, hence the almost streamline upper silhouette that you still find on multiple designs today. From the sketch above to the AM Plus that you see in 2018, it's easy to notice that not much has changed, with many things a lack of change can be negative factor. However, with the AM Plus in particular, the less that's changed the more authentic it appears. This being one thing Nike always seem to finesse when it comes to their designs. The old school sneakers with the least changes are always received well when rereleased, because customers love the simplicity of the originals. A few minor changes isn't enough to put us off.</div>
<div></div>
<span style="text-decoration: underline;">DESIGN</span>
<div align="justify">With an upper silhouette like none other the Air Max Plus had no direct competition until the hybrid <a href="https://sneakernews.com/tag/nike-vapormax-plus/page/2/">VaporMax Plus</a> popped up like "What's good?" in January this year. The caging that flows around the entirety of the upper resembling a trail of flames complemented by 3M reflective detailing we didn't know we needed until it was uncovered. For some, not all, of the AM Plus colourways the use of <a href="https://www.kicksonfire.com/nike-air-max-plus-spring-summer-2013/">gradients </a> on the caging has been top tier, especially on the lower part of the upper and the shank (that oddly shaped section by your instep). Of course, Nike have dropped some hit and miss colourways for this sneaker in particular but there's no denying that the quality and original vision is always present.</div>
<div></div>
<span style="text-decoration: underline;">PRICE</span>
<div align="justify">Depending on your age and location you'll know that the Air Jordan signified your entry into becoming a "sneakerhead," yet although Jordans are somewhat of a premium product plenty of people  today would pass up on a pair of J's to splash some cash on the AM Plus. Not that there's anything wrong with that, but a few years back that would be unheard of. Could you imagine a group of friends discussing what crep they're gonna cop next and one says the Air Max Plus? That could never run without a few laughs and bantering. Seriously though, the Air Max Plus has to be one of the most fairly priced sneakers by Nike especially when you look at it's popularity. For Men &amp; Women prices tend to range from: £124.99 to £149.99, and for Kids: £79.99 to £89.99.</div>
<span style="text-decoration: underline;">TUNED AIR</span>
<img class=" wp-image-3907 aligncenter" src="https://crepplug.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/ANATOMY_OF_AIR_INDIVIDUALS_JPEG_EXE_AMPLUS_native_1600-300x169.jpg" alt="Tuned Air Technology" width="355" height="253" />
<div align="justify">Although most Nike sneakers have some form of Air Technology, there's just something about Tuned Air that makes the Air Max Plus an eye catcher. Could it be that it acts as a window to view what Tuned Air actually looks like, with a running red and yellow theme in each pair. Or for the purpose of aesthetics, because it is very easy on the eye. If you happen to own a pair you'll know the comfort and durability levels that the AM Plus reaches, thanks to the hemispheres that can be found on the outsole as well as, the interior air technology. Creating a unique feature that only the AM Plus has.</div>
<span style="text-decoration: underline;">HOW TO BUY</span>
<div align="justify">What you've all been waiting for we're assuming. Here's four tips for you:
<strong>Tip 1:</strong> FootLocker
Yes, Nike and other retailers stock the AM Plus but, if you want a full range and variety to look at and potentially buy, FootLocker is where it's at. From older OG colourways to brand new releases, you're simply spoilt for choice.
<strong>Tip 2:</strong> Sizing
For any Crep Check Monday readers you'll know exactly what we're about to say: don't play yourself. If you have smaller feet from UK3.5-UK6, make the Kids section your best friend, because you will save so much coins. For the brand new <a href="https://www.footlocker.co.uk/en/p/nike-tuned-1-la-requin-grade-school-shoes-5154?v=316374922504#!searchCategory=all"> Black La Requin</a> you can pick up a pair in Size 3.5-6 for <a href="https://www.footlocker.co.uk/en/p/nike-tuned-1-la-requin-grade-school-shoes-5154?v=316374922504#!searchCategory=all"> £79.99.</a> You can also pick up the <a> La Requin,</a> in both <a href="https://www.footlocker.co.uk/en/p/nike-tuned-1-la-requin-men-shoes-4944?v=314212546304#!searchCategory=all"> Black </a> and <a href="https://www.footlocker.co.uk/en/p/nike-tuned-1-la-requin-men-shoes-4944?v=314212549704#!searchCategory=all"> White</a> in UK Adults: Size 6-11 for <a href="https://www.footlocker.co.uk/en/p/nike-tuned-1-la-requin-men-shoes-4944?v=314212546304#!searchCategory=all"> £144.99.</a> The price difference sitting at £65, with a few more pounds you could buy two Kids pairs for £159.98. Savings!
<strong>Tip 3:</strong> Sale
No matter what time of the year you happen to be looking at the Air Max Plus on FootLocker, there will always be a handful of wavy colourways for sale, the sale prices usually are £59.99 (Kids) and £89.99 (Adults). Of course, if you want the newer exclusive Womens or Mens colourways you're gonna have to firm it and buy them at their original prices, but in the end it will always be worth it.
<strong>Tip 4: </strong> Restocking
With new releases of the Air Max Plus, everyone wants a pair, understandably sizes start dropping until there's none left. However, one thing FootLock have been exceptionally good at with the AM Plus is restocking, they are A1. If a particular colourway is popular and sells out quickly, they will most likely have it back in stock roughly a week later. If this happens to you, check back in about a weeks time and they will most likely be available again.
<div>~</div>
<div align="justify">This is where it ends, if you've reached this far big up yourselves, we know this was a lengthy one, yet hope you found some useful information in here. Again thanks to Crep Plug for making this possible, if you want to stay updated with us you can find us on:
IG: <a href="https://www.instagram.com/crepcheckmondays">crepcheckmondays</a>
Twitter: <a href="https://www.twitter.com/crepcheckmonday">crepcheckmonday</a>
Website: <a href="https://www.crepckeckmondays.com">crepcheckmondays.com</a></div>
<div>Stay wavy!</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>
